mapper.select: select 'bt' as cssText,'출장' as gubun ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) +'~'+convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as term ,destination as info from ks_business_trip where #{searchDt} between start_dt and end_dt and crtd_id=#{crtdId} union all select 'le' as cssText,'휴가' as gubun ,convert(varchar(10),le_dt,120) as term ,memo as info from ks_leave where le_dt=#{searchDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId} union all select 'hl' as cssText ,'반휴' as gubun ,case when offcial='Y' then convert(varchar(10),hl_dt,120)+'(공가)' else convert(varchar(10),hl_dt,120) end as term ,memo as info from ks_half_leave where hl_dt=#{searchDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId} union all select 'wo' as cssText ,'외근' as gubun ,convert(varchar(5),start_tm,114)+ case when here_go_yn='Y' then '(현출)' else '' end +' ~ '+convert(varchar(5),end_tm,114) + case when here_out_yn='Y' then '(현퇴)' else '' end as term ,destination as info from ks_workout where out_dt=#{searchDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId} union all select 're' as cssText ,'빠지는날' as gubun ,convert(varchar(5),min(repl_start_tm),114)+'~'+convert(varchar(5),max(repl_end_tm),114) as term ,min(memo) as info from ks_replace where repl_dt=#{searchDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId} group by repl_dt union all ( select 'su' as cssText ,'채우는날' as gubun ,rtrim(sum(term)/60)+'시간'+rtrim(sum(term)%60)+'분' as term ,min(memo) as info from ks_replace where supple_dt=#{searchDt} and crtd_id=#{crtdId} group by supple_dt )

select crtd_id as id ,'bt' as cssText,'출장' as gubun ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) +'~'+convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as term ,destination as info from ks_business_trip where #{searchDt} between start_dt and end_dt union all select crtd_id as id ,'le' as cssText,'휴가' as gubun ,convert(varchar(10),le_dt,120) as term ,case when offcial ='Y' then '(공가) '+memo else memo end as info from ks_leave where le_dt=#{searchDt} union all select crtd_id as id ,'hl' as cssText ,'반휴' as gubun ,convert(varchar(10),hl_dt,120) as term ,case when offcial ='Y' then '(공가) '+memo else memo end as info from ks_half_leave where hl_dt=#{searchDt} union all select crtd_id as id ,'wo' as cssText ,'외근' as gubun ,convert(varchar(5),start_tm,114)+ case when here_go_yn='Y' then '(현출)' else '' end +' ~ '+convert(varchar(5),end_tm,114) + case when here_out_yn='Y' then '(현퇴)' else '' end as term ,destination as info from ks_workout where out_dt=#{searchDt} union all select crtd_id as id ,'re' as cssText ,'빠지는날' as gubun ,convert(varchar(5),min(repl_start_tm),114)+'~'+convert(varchar(5),max(repl_end_tm),114) as term ,min(memo) as info from ks_replace where repl_dt=#{searchDt} group by repl_dt, crtd_id union all ( select crtd_id as id ,'su' as cssText ,'채우는날' as gubun ,rtrim(sum(term)/60)+'시간'+rtrim(sum(term)%60)+'분' as term ,min(memo) as info from ks_replace where supple_dt=#{searchDt} group by supple_dt, crtd_id )

select top 1 id ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) as start_dt ,convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as end_dt ,destination ,memo ,crtd_id ,crtd_dt from ks_business_trip kbt where crtd_id=#{searchId} and #{searchDt} between start_dt and end_dt order by id desc
select top 1 id ,convert(varchar(10),le_dt,120) as start_dt ,term ,memo ,offcial ,crtd_id ,crtd_dt from ks_leave kl where crtd_id=#{searchId} and le_dt=#{searchDt} order by id desc
select top 1 id ,convert(varchar(10),hl_dt,120) as hl_dt ,term ,memo ,offcial ,crtd_id ,crtd_dt from ks_half_leave khl where crtd_id=#{searchId} and hl_dt = #{searchDt} order by id desc

select id ,convert(varchar(10),out_dt,120) as out_dt ,week_name ,convert(varchar(5),start_tm,114) as start_tm ,convert(varchar(5),end_tm,114) as end_tm ,diffm ,isnull(here_go_yn,'N') as here_go_yn ,isnull(here_out_yn,'N') as here_out_yn ,destination ,crtd_id ,crtd_dt from ks_workout kw where crtd_id=#{searchId} and out_dt = #{searchDt}

select max(id) as id ,convert(varchar(10),max(repl_dt),120) as repl_dt ,convert(varchar(5),min(repl_start_tm),114) as repl_start_tm ,convert(varchar(5),max(repl_end_tm),114) as repl_end_tm ,sum(term) as term ,max(in_lunch) as in_lunch ,convert(varchar(10),min(supple_dt),120) as supple_dt ,max(memo) as memo ,min(crtd_id) as crtd_id ,min(crtd_dt) as crtd_dt from ks_replace re where crtd_id=#{searchId} and repl_dt=#{searchDt} group by repl_dt

select id ,convert(varchar(10),repl_dt,120) as repl_dt ,convert(varchar(5),repl_start_tm,114) as repl_start_tm ,convert(varchar(5),repl_end_tm,114) as repl_end_tm ,term ,rtrim(term/60)+'시간'+rtrim(term%60)+'분' as term_hm ,convert(varchar(10),supple_dt,120) as supple_dt ,memo ,crtd_id ,crtd_dt from ks_replace re where crtd_id=#{searchId} and supple_dt=#{searchDt}

select #{searchDt} as searchDt ,u.id,u.caps_id,u.caps_name ,u.dept_cd ,(select name from code_data where group_key='DEPT' and code=u.dept_cd and use_yn='Y') as dept_name ,(case when e.early_go is null then a.here_go else e.early_here_go end) as cal_here_go ,a.here_go ,a.here_out ,a.late_tm ,e.early_go ,e.early_here_go ,u.dash_state ,u.inside_tel from (select * from ks_user where auth_cd not in ('003') and state_cd ='001') u left outer join ( select id,UserName, substring(min(att_Date),1,4)+ '-' + substring(min(att_Date),5,2) + '-' + substring(min(att_Date),7,2) + ' ' + substring(min(att_Date),9,2) + ':' + substring(min(att_Date),11,2) as here_go, substring(max(att_Date),1,4)+ '-' + substring(max(att_Date),5,2) + '-' + substring(max(att_Date),7,2) + + ' ' + substring(max(att_Date),9,2) + ':' + substring(max(att_Date),11,2) as here_out, (select #{searchDt} + ' ' +go_end_tm from ks_daily_rule where #{searchDt} between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt) as late_tm from Attendance where substring(Att_Date,1,8)=replace(#{searchDt},'-','') and substring(Att_Date,1,12) > (select replace(#{searchDt},'-','')+replace(go_start_tm,':','') from ks_daily_rule where #{searchDt} between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt) group by id,UserName ) a on u.caps_id=a.id and u.caps_name=a.UserName left outer join ( select id,UserName, substring(min(att_Date),1,4)+ '-' + substring(min(att_Date),5,2) + '-' + substring(min(att_Date),7,2) + ' ' + substring(min(att_Date),9,2) + ':' + substring(min(att_Date),11,2) as early_go, (select #{searchDt} + ' ' +go_start_tm from ks_daily_rule where #{searchDt} between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt) as early_here_go from Attendance where substring(Att_Date,1,8)=replace(#{searchDt},'-','') and substring(Att_Date,1,12) between replace(#{searchDt},'-','')+'0400' and (select replace(#{searchDt},'-','')+replace(go_start_tm,':','') from ks_daily_rule where #{searchDt} between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt) group by id,UserName ) e on u.caps_id=e.id and u.caps_name=e.UserName order by u.dept_cd,u.id
